subject: Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Friendship
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn and Maria Riesch are the two best women’s Alpine skiers in the world, and their drive to win is matched only by their commitment to friendship.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn and Maria Riesch are the two best women’s Alpine skiers in the world, and their drive to win is matched only by their commitment to friendship.
